name: Demonic Nightmare
description: Here it is! After months of hard work and slacking off I proudly present to you.... Demonic nightmare! Undoubtedly the best gameplay mod for doom 2! With an all new midi sound track from amazing artists, completely new custom enemies, enhanced doom weapon animation, new difficulty settings, brand new skies and PSX doom sound effects! You'll be blown out of your seat when you play this amazing gameplay mod!
